name: watch-and-learn
description: A chrome extension to make learn videos better using video.js
author: Aditya Thakral <github@9at8.dev>

scripts.assemble: rm -r ./pkg; mkdir ./pkg && cp manifest.json pkg && cp -r build pkg && cp -r static pkg && cp -r lib pkg && cp -r src pkg
scripts.zip: yarn run assemble && pushd ./pkg; zip -r ../watch-and-learn.zip $(ls); popd
